@graph.name: Shopify Product Descriptions Advanced AI Prompt Using PAS Framework
@graph.description: The following is the process to use the “PAS Product Description With Internal Links ” & “PAS Product Description” AI prompt that is available in the Optizen AI public prompt repository. The Prompt Note: The only difference between the 2 prompts is the last 2 sections that includes or excludes internal linking. Where To Use […]

step.name: Navigate to product tab
step.text: Navigate to the 'product' tab in Optizen AI. Search via name or using tags for the product or products you wish to update. Use the check boxes to select the products.

step.name: Select PAS prompt
step.text: Select the 'PAS Product Description With Internal Links' or 'PAS Product Description' from the drop down under the Product Description prompt field. Ensure you are using the prompt repository tab. Be sure to check the box for 'Update this section'. Then click Proceed.

step.name: Run the prompt
step.text: Click Proceed to run the prompt. On completion, check the output using the Log section of the app. You can then choose to keep or restore the update.

mainEntity.name: Where can I use this AI prompt?

acceptedAnswer.text: This prompt is specific to the product description of Shopify products. You can use the prompt in its raw form from the repository, and then replace sections for your specific use case.

mainEntity.name: When should I use this prompt?

acceptedAnswer.text: This prompt can be used for any product in your Shopify store using the Optizen AI app if you want a more advanced AI prompt to update product description content, add internal links, and also include FAQs and schema.

The PAS copywriting framework is a simple way to structure your copy so that it's clear, concise, and persuasive. PAS stands for Problem, Agitation, Solution. You start by identifying your reader's problem, agitate it so they understand the full extent of the issue, and then offer a solution.
